attributes.action: We the undersigned call on Government to honour the result of the EU Referendum.
attributes.additional_details: The referendum of 23rd June was known about for the best part of 4 months or more. Maybe the people complaining about the result should have got off their ARSE and voted when they had the chance.
attributes.background: On the 23rd of June 2016 the UK voted to leave the European Union. Some people are now moaning that democracy prevailed and their side lost. They intend to overturn the result of this referendum by calling for a second go. We ask HM Governemt to honour the result of the 23rd June Referendum in full.
